item.description:
Update #2:
Per weather.com the snow storm is scheduled to start at 5pm so we should be all set for the hike. See everyone there!!

Update: I highly recommend Boots for this hike. Also if people could think on how difficult/ easy a hike they want to do and how long of a hike. When we meet we can all decide then.


We will meet for a hike off leash weather permitting.
If it is not snowing heavy or raining we will meet up. I will post an update if it is cancelled.

Directions
From the Norwich area: take Route 2 west, Exit 18. Follow Route 16 west for 6.2 miles; turn left into the recreation area.

From the New London area: follow Route 11 north onto Route 2 west, Exit 18. Follow Route 16 west for 6.2 miles. Turn left into the recreation area.

From the Middletown area: follow Route 66 east onto Route 16. Follow Route 16 east for 5.5 miles. Turn right into recreation area.

From the Hartford area: take Route 2 east, Exit 16. Follow Route 149 south for 3.2 miles. Turn right onto Route 16 west. Follow Route 16 west for 1.9 miles. Turn left into the recreation area.

Link to DEP page
http://www.ct.gov/dep...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there with the Blue Ford Edge
item.name: Salmon River State Forest Hike
